name: Abjure
materials: Holy symbol, holy water, and an inimical substance (iron, silver, etc.)
description:
This spell allows the caster to attempt to send a creature from some other plane of existence back to its home plane. The spell requires that the caster know the name of the creature to be sent back (if any) or the specific type of creature (for instance, most lesser demons and devils don’t have proper names). The creature to be abjured must be touched by the caster, and is entitled to a special saving throw; the base chance of success is **50%**, adjusted by **1% for every difference in levels / hit dice** between the caster and the target (example: an 11th level cleric casting this spell on a succubus (6 hit dice) would have a 55% chance of successfully abjuring the creature).

The spell requires the caster’s **holy symbol** (which is not consumed by the casting of the spell), as well as **holy water** and some other substance which is inimical to the target creature (iron to a demon, silver to a devil, etc.).

**Reverse — Implore:**

The reverse of the spell, *implore*, allows the caster to summon some being from another plane, with the same percent chance of success as described above for abjuring an extra-planar creature. Deities of any sort are immune to the spell’s effects, although their servants are not; however in any case there is no telling whether the being that answers the caster’s imploring will indeed be friendly. This spell has the same components as *abjure*, except that some substance desired by the targeted being must be provided.

This spell bears comparison with the more powerful *dismiss creature* spells (p. 207).

name: Acid Arrow
materials: Powdered rhubarb leaf and adder stomach
description:
This spell creates a magical arrow made of acid that springs from the caster’s hand and flies unerringly to its target. The target must be within range and visible to the caster. The acid arrow inflicts **2-4 (2d2)** points of acid damage immediately upon impact, and **continues to burn** for 1 additional round per three caster levels.

Each additional round of burning automatically inflicts another **2-4** points of acid damage.

If the caster has a magic bow, the acid arrow’s range is increased by 50%.

The material components are powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach, which are mixed together during the casting.

name: Advanced Illusion
description:
This spell creates an illusion with visual, auditory, olfactory, and thermal elements. The illusion can be of a creature, an object, or a scene, and remains as long as the caster concentrates upon it, plus 3 rounds thereafter.

If the illusion involves a creature, it can move and act as the caster directs, within the limits of the illusion. Sounds, smells, and heat appropriate to the illusion are included.

Creatures viewing the illusion are entitled to a saving throw to disbelieve it, but only if they have reason to suspect it is not real. Success negates the illusion for that creature only.

The material component is a bit of fleece.

name: Aerial Servant
description:
By means of this spell, the caster summons an invisible aerial servant to fetch and return an object or creature. The caster must be able to clearly communicate the desired object or creature, including its location if unknown. The aerial servant will not return with something that weighs more than it can carry (max 8,000 g.p.).

If the assigned task cannot be fulfilled, the aerial servant will return to report failure.

If commanded to seize a creature, the aerial servant attacks using its crushing grasp. The creature must succeed in a Strength check (penalized by the aerial servant’s strength) or be captured.

The aerial servant remains invisible but can be detected by certain spells.

The material component is burning incense appropriate to the deity of the cleric.

name: Affect Normal Fires
description:
This spell alters the size of a normal fire source (campfire, torch, small hearthfire, etc.), causing it to either double or halve in size. The spell does not affect magical fires in any way.

A fire that doubles in size will shed twice the light and may inflict double the normal damage if used as a weapon (DM’s discretion). It may also be required to save vs. normal fires or spread if near flammable material.

A fire that is reduced to half its size will give off only half its normal light, and its ability to ignite new fires is correspondingly reduced.

Only one fire source can be affected at a time.

**Reverse — Quench Normal Fires:**

The reverse, *quench normal fires*, reduces a normal fire source to nothing, effectively extinguishing it. It will not affect magical fires.

name: Aid
description:
By means of this spell, the caster blesses another creature and imbues it with courage and fighting spirit. The recipient gains the benefit of a *bless* spell (bonus of +1 to attack rolls and saving throws against fear effects) and a temporary increase of hit points.

The amount of temporary hit points is determined by rolling 1d8 +1 points per caster level (maximum +10). These temporary hit points last until they are lost through damage. They do not heal naturally, and they are always lost first when the creature takes damage.

The spell cannot be used on a creature already under the effect of a *bless* spell.

The material component is a strip of white cloth, wrapped around the recipient’s wrist or arm during the casting.

name: Air Walk
description:
The recipient of this spell is able to tread on air as if it were solid ground. Upward or downward movement is possible at a 45° angle.

The rate of ascent or descent is 10' per round. Horizontal movement is at normal walking speed.

The subject must have at least a small running start (at least 10') to begin ascending.

A strong wind may affect movement while under the spell.

The material component is a bit of thistledown.

name: Alarm
description:
This spell sets an invisible mental alarm against intruders. The caster sets an area up to 20 ft. square per level. If a creature larger than a rat enters the warded area, the caster receives a mental signal (provided the caster is within one mile of the area).

The alarm lasts for 2 hours per level.

The caster can designate specific creatures to ignore the alarm.

name: Alter Reality
description:
This spell allows the caster to change reality itself, creating effects similar to limited wish or wish spells. However, the effect must be illusory in nature.

The greater the desired effect, the greater the chance the illusion will be noticed and disbelieved.

The DM must adjudicate the final results.

name: Alter Self
description:
This spell causes the caster to assume the form of another creature of roughly the same size and mass. The caster can alter height, weight, facial features, and skin coloration, but gains no abilities of the chosen form.

The change lasts for 2 turns + 1 turn/level.

name: Animal Growth
description:
This spell causes one or more animals to grow to twice their normal size and eight times their normal weight. Their attacks and damage are doubled.

The spell affects one animal per level of the caster.

The reverse, *reduce animal*, halves the size and weight.

name: Animal Summoning I
description:
By casting this spell, the druid calls for animals to come to aid him. The type of animals is determined by the DM based on the local environment.

Animals will arrive within 1d6 rounds and will obey the caster as best they can.

The spell summons up to 8 Hit Dice of animals.

name: Animal Summoning II
description: This spell functions as animal summoning I, except that up to **16 Hit Dice** of animals can be summoned.

name: Animal Summoning III
description: This spell functions as animal summoning I, except that up to **24 Hit Dice** of animals can be summoned.

name: Animate Dead
description:
This spell creates undead skeletons or zombies from bones or corpses. Animated undead obey the caster’s simple verbal commands.

Skeletons have one Hit Die, zombies have two.

One skeleton or zombie can be created per caster level.

The caster must have a piece of bone for the material component.

name: Animate Object
description:
This spell enables the caster to imbue inanimate objects with mobility and a semblance of life.

The caster can animate one object per caster level. Size affects how well an object can move.

Animated objects obey simple verbal commands.

Duration is 1 round per level.

name: Animate Rock
description: This spell is identical to animate object, except that it only affects rock and stone.

name: Anti-Animal Shell
description:
This spell creates an invisible, mobile barrier around the caster, preventing all natural and giant-sized animals from approaching within 10'.

Animals forced against the shell are repelled.

name: Anti-Plant Shell
description: This spell creates a barrier similar to anti-animal shell, except that it repels all plant life (including animated plants and plant monsters) within a 10' radius.

name: Antipathy/Sympathy
description:
**Antipathy:** Creates an overwhelming urge to avoid an area or object.

**Sympathy:** Creates an overwhelming urge to approach an area or object.

A successful saving throw negates the effect.

The material component is an object from the area or object to be enchanted.

name: Armor
description:
This spell creates a magical force that surrounds the caster or a touched creature, improving its Armor Class to 6 + Dexterity bonus.

The armor spell lasts until the wearer sustains damage or the duration expires.

name: Astral Spell
description:
This spell allows the caster to project his astral body into the Astral Plane, leaving the physical body behind in suspended animation.

The astral body is connected by a silver cord.

If the cord is severed, death occurs.

name: Audible Glamer
description:
This spell creates illusory sounds that seem to come from a place the caster designates.

Sounds can range from whispers to shouts, or battle sounds.

Disbelief requires interaction and a saving throw.

name: Augury
materials: Specially marked sticks, bones, or tokens
description:
This spell allows the caster to determine if a particular action will bring good or bad results.

Base chance of accurate reading is 70% + 1% per level of the caster.

name: Awaken
description:
This spell awakens an animal to human-like intelligence.

The animal’s loyalty is determined by the DM.

name: Banishment
description:
This spell forces extraplanar creatures out of the caster’s plane of existence.

A saving throw negates the effect.

The caster can use specially prepared material components to penalize saving throws.

name: Barkskin
description:
This spell toughens the recipient’s skin, improving Armor Class by 1 and all saving throws by 1.

The material component is a handful of bark.

name: Bash Door
description:
This spell allows the caster to make a single bash attempt against a locked, barred, or stuck door with double normal chance of success.

If successful, the door is opened or broken.

name: Beast Shape
description: This spell allows the caster to transform into a mammal, reptile, or bird of their choice, gaining appropriate physical abilities but retaining mental faculties.

name: Bind
description:
This spell binds one or more willing creatures together, strengthening their teamwork. Each creature gains +1 to attack rolls when fighting together.

Duration is 1 turn/level.

name: Black Tentacles
description:
This spell causes rubbery black tentacles to erupt from a surface, grappling creatures in the area.

Each tentacle attacks independently.

Targets must save or be held fast.

name: Bless
description:
This spell blesses allies within a 50' cube, giving them a +1 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws against fear.

The reverse, *curse*, bestows a -1 penalty.

name: Bless Water
description: This spell blesses a flask of water, creating holy water capable of harming undead and creatures vulnerable to it.

name: Blindness/Deafness
description: This spell causes a creature to become either permanently blind or deaf (caster’s choice) unless a saving throw is made.

name: Blink
description:
This spell causes the caster to randomly vanish and reappear for the duration of the spell.

The caster can teleport up to 10' per round.

name: Blur
description:
This spell causes the caster’s outline to become blurred, making it harder to hit.

Attackers suffer a -4 penalty on their first attack and -2 thereafter.

name: Body Clock
description: This spell allows the caster to know the exact time of day or night with perfect accuracy.

name: Boil Water
description: This spell causes a volume of water to boil rapidly. It can affect 1 gallon of water per level of the caster.

name: Borrow Strength
description: This spell allows the caster to temporarily borrow Strength points from a willing creature within range, increasing the caster's own Strength by an equivalent amount.

name: Break Enchantment
description:
This spell frees victims from enchantments, charms, and compulsions.

It ends effects like charm person, geas, or hold spells.

A successful caster level check may be required.

name: Breath Weapon
description:
This spell grants the caster the ability to use a breath weapon similar to a dragon's attack once.

The type of breath (fire, frost, etc.) is determined randomly or by DM discretion.

name: Call Lightning
description:
This spell calls down a bolt of lightning from the sky (outdoors only).

One bolt is called every 10 minutes for the spell’s duration.

Each bolt inflicts 2d8 points of damage, plus 1 point per caster level.

name: Call Woodland Beings
description:
This spell summons creatures from wooded areas to aid the caster.

The beings' reaction to the summoner depends on alignment and intentions.

name: Calm
description:
This spell calms creatures of animal Intelligence or lower within a 20 ft. radius.

Hostile actions break the effect.

name: Calm Animal
description:
This spell soothes one or more animals, preventing hostile action unless provoked.

A successful saving throw negates.

name: Cause Disease
description:
This spell causes a debilitating disease in the subject touched unless a saving throw is made.

The disease weakens the victim, causing significant penalties.

name: Chain Lightning
description:
This spell releases a powerful bolt of lightning that arcs to additional targets.

Each subsequent target takes half the damage dealt to the previous one.

name: Change Self
description:
This spell causes the caster to alter his appearance, including clothing and equipment.

The change cannot withstand physical contact or close scrutiny.

name: Chaos
description:
This spell affects 2d6 creatures, causing confusion as per the confusion spell, but without the saving throw normally allowed.

Creatures act randomly each round.

name: Charm Monster
description:
This spell is similar to charm person but can affect any creature.

The victim receives a saving throw.

A charmed monster regards the caster as a trusted friend and ally.

name: Charm Person
description:
This spell causes a humanoid creature to regard the caster as a trusted friend and ally.

The target is allowed a saving throw to resist.

name: Charm Plants
description:
This spell enables the caster to make plants obedient.

The plants can entangle, clear paths, or perform similar tasks.

name: Clairaudience
description:
This spell allows the caster to hear at a distance.

The caster can hear through barriers within a limited range.

name: Clairvoyance
description:
This spell allows the caster to see at a distance through a magical sensor.

The sensor must be placed within 60 yards plus 10 yards per caster level.

name: Clone
materials: Flesh from creature to be cloned
description:
This spell creates a duplicate of a creature from a part of its body.

The clone grows in 2d4 months and is the same in all respects as the original.

name: Cloudkill
description:
This spell creates a bank of greenish fog that moves away from the caster.

Creatures of 3 Hit Dice or fewer die immediately if they enter the cloud.

name: Color Spray
aoe: 10 ft. wide by 30 ft. long fan
description: This spell creates a vivid fan of clashing colors, stunning or blinding creatures within its area.

name: Combine
description: By means of this spell, up to three clerics can combine their abilities to channel energy more effectively for turning undead.

name: Command
description: This spell forces the subject to obey a one-word command on its next action, such as 'sleep', 'flee', or 'drop'.

name: Commune
description: This spell allows the caster to ask their deity a number of yes-or-no questions, typically one per caster level.

name: Commune With Nature
description: This spell enables the caster to become one with nature, gaining knowledge of the surrounding area regarding terrain, plants, minerals, bodies of water, people, and general animal population.

name: Comprehend Languages
description: This spell allows the caster to understand the spoken or written language of a creature or object touched.

name: Cone of Cold
description: This spell releases a cone-shaped burst of freezing air that deals 1d4+1 points of cold damage per caster level to all creatures within the cone.

name: Confusion
description:
This spell causes confusion in a group of creatures, making them act randomly for the spell’s duration.

Affected creatures might attack, flee, babble, or act normally.

name: Conjure Animals
description: This spell summons one or more animals to aid the caster. The total Hit Dice of the summoned animals cannot exceed twice the caster’s level.

name: Conjure Elemental
description: This spell summons an elemental (air, earth, fire, or water) to serve the caster. The caster must maintain concentration to control the elemental.

name: Conjure Fire Elemental
description: This spell summons a fire elemental to serve the caster. The caster must maintain concentration to control the elemental.

name: Contact Other Plane
description:
This spell allows the caster to contact powers from other planes of existence for answers to questions.

There is a risk of insanity if the contact fails.

name: Contagion
description: This spell causes a disease to be contracted by the target, severely weakening it.

name: Continual Light
description: This spell creates a permanent light centered on an object or point chosen by the caster.

name: Control Temperature, 10' Radius
description: This spell allows the caster to raise or lower the ambient temperature within the area of effect by up to 18°F plus 1°F per caster level.

name: Control Undead
description: This spell grants the caster control over undead creatures, forcing them to obey commands.

name: Control Weather
description: This spell allows the caster to alter local weather conditions in a specific area, changing existing conditions to desired ones.

name: Control Winds
description: This spell allows the caster to control wind speed and direction within the area of effect.

name: Create Food & Water
description: This spell creates food and water sufficient to feed three humans or one horse per caster level for one day.

name: Creeping Doom
description: This spell summons a swarm of insects to attack the caster’s enemies.

name: Cure Critical Wounds
description: This spell heals 3d8 + 1 point per caster level (up to +20) of damage to a single creature.

name: Cure Disease
description: This spell cures all diseases affecting the creature touched, both natural and magical.

name: Cure Light Wounds
description: This spell cures 1d8 points of damage to the creature touched.

name: Cure Moderate Wounds
description: This spell heals 2d8 + 1 point per caster level (up to +10) of damage.

name: Cure Serious Wounds
description: This spell cures 3d8 + 1 point per caster level (up to +15) of damage.

name: Dancing Lights
description: This spell creates up to four lights that resemble lanterns or glowing spheres, drifting in the air.

name: Darkness 15' Radius
description: This spell creates an area of total darkness in a 15 ft. radius, blocking vision completely.

name: Darkvision
description: This spell grants the recipient the ability to see in total darkness, just like a creature with natural darkvision.

name: Daylight
description: This spell causes an area to be brightly lit, as if by daylight, negating magical darkness.

name: Death Spell
description: This spell instantly slays creatures within the area of effect that have fewer than a specified number of Hit Dice.

name: Death Ward
description: This spell protects the subject from death magic and energy-draining attacks for the duration.

name: Delayed Blast Fireball
materials: Ball of bat guano and sulfur
description: This spell creates a fireball that explodes after a set delay. It deals 1d6 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 20d6).

name: Demand
description: This spell sends a message to a creature and compels it to obey a command if it fails a saving throw.

name: Detect Charm
description: This spell detects if a creature is under the influence of a charm spell.

name: Detect Evil
description: This spell detects emanations of evil from any creature, object, or area.

name: Detect Illusion
description: This spell reveals illusions and disguises within its area of effect.

name: Detect Invisibility
description: This spell reveals invisible creatures or objects within its range.

name: Detect Lie
description: This spell reveals deliberate lies spoken in the caster's presence.

name: Detect Magic
description: This spell detects magical auras within its area of effect.

name: Detect Snares and Pits
description: This spell enables the caster to detect snares, pits, and similar hazards within its area.

name: Detect Undead
description: This spell reveals the presence of undead creatures within its area.

name: Dimension Door
description: This spell instantly transports the caster a short distance to a location within range.

name: Diminish Plants
description: This spell reduces the size or density of plants in a half-mile radius, easing travel or clearing a path.

name: Disguise Self
description: This spell allows the caster to alter appearance to look like someone else of the same general size and shape.

name: Disintegrate
description: This spell causes a creature or object to disintegrate into dust if it fails a saving throw.

name: Dismissal
description: This spell forces an extraplanar creature back to its home plane if it fails a saving throw.

name: Dispel Evil
description: This spell wards the target against attacks by evil creatures and banishes them if touched.

name: Dispel Magic
description: This spell cancels ongoing spells and magical effects within its area of effect.

name: Displacement
description: This spell causes the recipient to appear shifted from their actual location, giving attackers a penalty to hit.

name: Divination
description: This spell provides a useful piece of advice regarding a specific goal, event, or activity that will occur within the next 30 minutes.

name: Dolor
description: This spell causes extreme pain in the target, causing it to suffer penalties to attack and defense.

name: Dream
description: This spell allows the caster to send a message to a sleeping creature in the form of a dream.

name: Duo-Dimension
description: This spell flattens the caster into a two-dimensional form, making it extremely difficult to see and target.

name: Earthquake
description: This spell causes a powerful earthquake that affects the terrain, possibly opening fissures or destroying structures.

name: Emotion
description: This spell causes affected creatures to feel a powerful emotion such as fear, despair, or rage, influencing their actions.

name: Emotion Control
description: This spell allows the caster to instill emotions in creatures, overriding or changing existing emotional states.

name: Enchant an Item
description: This spell prepares an item to receive a magical enchantment. This is the first step toward creating a magical item.

name: Enchanted Weapon
description: This spell temporarily enchants a weapon, allowing it to hit creatures normally immune to non-magical attacks.

name: Energy Drain
description: This spell drains levels or Hit Dice from a living creature touched, severely weakening or killing it.

name: Entangle
description: This spell causes plants in the area of effect to entangle creatures, slowing their movement or trapping them.

name: ESP
description: This spell allows the caster to read the surface thoughts of any creature in the area of effect.

name: Explosive Runes
description: This spell inscribes runes on a book, map, scroll, or similar object. When read, the runes explode, dealing 6d4+6 points of damage.

name: Extension I
description: This spell extends the duration of another 1st-3rd level spell previously cast by the magic-user.

name: Extension II
description: This spell extends the duration of another 1st-4th level spell previously cast by the magic-user.

name: Extension III
description: This spell extends the duration of another 1st-5th level spell previously cast by the magic-user.

name: Eyebite
description: This spell causes the caster’s gaze to sicken, charm, or put to sleep one creature each round.

name: Fabricate
description: This spell converts raw materials into finished items. The caster must know the basics of the crafting process.

name: Faithful Hound
materials: Silver whistle, a piece of bone
description: This spell conjures a phantom watchdog that guards an area and attacks intruders.

name: Faithful Phantom Guardian
description: This spell creates a permanent, invisible guardian that defends a specified location.

name: Feign Death
description: This spell places the subject into a cataleptic state that is impossible to distinguish from death.

name: Find Familiar
description: This spell summons a familiar to serve the caster.

name: Find the Path
description: This spell enables the recipient to find the shortest, most direct physical route to a specified destination.

name: Finger of Death
description: This spell causes the death of one creature by pointing at it. A successful save negates the effect.

name: Fire Seeds
description: This spell turns acorns or berries into magical incendiaries that can be thrown or placed as mines.

name: Fire Storm
description: This spell creates a storm of fire in a designated area, causing massive damage to creatures and objects.

name: Fire Trap
description: This spell protects an object with a fiery explosion that triggers if the object is opened without speaking a password.

name: Fireball
description: This spell creates a fiery explosion that deals 1d6 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 10d6).

name: Flame Blade
description: This spell creates a blazing blade of fire that can be used as a weapon by the caster.

name: Flame Strike
description: This spell calls down a vertical column of divine fire that damages all creatures within its area.

name: Floating Disc
description: This spell creates a floating platform that can carry loads for the caster.

name: Fly
description: This spell grants the ability to fly at a speed of 12 (MC:B) for the duration.

name: Fog Cloud
description: This spell creates a fog that obscures vision, providing concealment.

name: Fool's Speech
description: This spell causes the target to babble incoherently, unable to communicate sense.

name: Forbiddance
description: This spell seals an area against all planar travel and inflicts damage on creatures of specified alignments.

name: Forget
description: This spell causes the subjects to forget events of the past 5 minutes per caster level.

name: Foresight
description: This spell grants a powerful sixth sense, warning the subject of impending danger.

name: Freedom of Movement
description: This spell allows the subject to move and act freely even under magical restraints or difficult terrain.

name: Gate
description: This spell opens a portal to another plane and summons a powerful being to the caster’s aid.

name: Geas
description: This spell compels a creature to follow a command or suffer penalties and eventual death.

name: Giant Insect
description: This spell enlarges normal insects into giant versions to serve the caster.

name: Glassee
description: This spell causes a section of metal, stone, or wood to become transparent like glass.

name: Glitterdust
description: This spell creates a cloud of glittering golden particles that reveals invisible creatures and blinds targets.

name: Globe of Invulnerability
description: This spell creates an immobile, faintly shimmering barrier that completely negates all 1st-4th level spells cast into or out of the globe.

name: Glyth of Warding
description: This spell inscribes a glyph that triggers a magical trap when specific conditions are met.

name: Grease
description: This spell covers an area with slippery grease, causing creatures to slip and fall or making objects hard to grasp.

name: Group Invisibility
description: This spell renders all creatures touched invisible until they attack or the spell ends.

name: Gust of Wind
description: This spell creates a strong blast of air that can extinguish candles, torches, and similar unprotected flames.

name: Hallucinatory Forest
description: This spell makes an area appear as if it were a dense forest, hiding terrain features and creatures within.

name: Hallucinatory Terrain
description: This spell changes the appearance of the terrain to conceal actual terrain features.

name: Haste
description: This spell doubles the movement and attack rates of affected creatures but ages them by one year.

name: Heal
description: This spell cures all diseases, blindness, and all hit point damage of the touched creature.

name: Heroes' Feast
description: This spell creates a magnificent feast that cures diseases, neutralizes poison, and provides other benefits to those who partake.

name: Hold Animal
description: This spell holds animals rigid, immobilizing them as if paralyzed.

name: Hold Monster
description: This spell holds up to four creatures immobile as if paralyzed.

name: Hold Person
description: This spell holds humanoid creatures immobile, paralyzing them.

name: Hold Plant
description: This spell holds one or more plant creatures or plants fast, immobilizing them.

name: Holy Word
description: This spell utters a powerful word that drives off, banishes, or otherwise affects evil creatures within its area.

name: Ice Storm
description: This spell creates a storm of ice and sleet that batters creatures and objects within the area.

name: Identify
description: This spell identifies the magical properties of an item, though exact results depend on a percentile roll.

name: Illusionary Script
description: This spell creates a script that only the intended reader can decipher; others trigger a magical effect.

name: Imbue With Spell Ability
description: This spell transfers some of the caster’s spell power to another creature, allowing it to cast cleric spells.

name: Imprisonment
description: This spell entombs a creature far beneath the earth, where it remains imprisoned until freed by a specific magic.

name: Improved Phantasmal Force
description: This spell creates an illusion with visual, auditory, and thermal effects, much more convincing than a simple phantasmal force.

name: Infravision
description: This spell grants the recipient the ability to see heat patterns in the dark.

name: Invisibility
description: This spell renders a creature invisible until it attacks or the duration expires.

name: Invisibility 10' Radius
description: This spell renders all creatures within 10 feet of the recipient invisible, as per invisibility.

name: Invisibility to Animals
description: This spell makes the recipient invisible to normal animals.

name: Invisibility to Undead
description: This spell makes the recipient invisible to undead creatures, although intelligent undead are allowed a saving throw.

name: Ironwood
description: This spell allows the caster to shape plant material into a substance as hard as iron.

name: Irresistible Dance
description: This spell forces the subject to begin dancing uncontrollably, making it unable to attack, defend, or cast spells.

name: Know Alignment
description: This spell reveals the alignment of a creature or object.
